title: Iranai Skill Wo Kaitorimasu
description:
Description :
        A world where the gods grant humans "Skills" from birth. Although there are many skills that grant a happier life, there exist some that only make life more difficult. "Monster Attractor", "Weak Constitution", "Ill-fated" - this is the story of a "Skill Collector" who travels to various places, purchasing such "useless" skills.
